Name: Sexy Heroine! Part 2
About the game: PRESENTATION Your sexy heroine is back, contacted by a new King in trouble! This RPG features 2 different heroines: fighter assassin Select one of them and embark on a quest that will take you into the depths of a dark dungeon inhabited by evil forces. All 2 heroines have different strengths and weaknesses, so make your choice carefully. Solve riddles, unravel ancient secrets and defeat dangerous foes. Only then you can hope to complete your quest successfully. But also, enjoy the many different features the game has to offer: open a bank account invest in real estate craft rare artifacts pierce your heroine visit and even own an island resort! And many more surprises! This game contains frequent nudity. DON'T MISS THE FIRST ADVENTURE OF YOUR SEXY HEROINE! / CONTROLS To move characters and the cursor, use the directional buttons on the game pad or the arrow keys on the keyboard. ENTER/SPACE : Confirm, OK, Enter ESC : Cancel, Menu PAGE UP : Previous page PAGE DOWN : Next page If you're playing with the mouse: LEFT-CLICK : Move characters, Confirm, OK, Enter RIGHT-CLICK : Cancel, Menu ALT+ENTER : Switches between window mode and full-screen mode. ALT+F4 : Forcibly exits the game. F12 : Forcibly returns to the title screen. PLAY OTHER AWESOME GAMES! / /
